pages.title: Pour the Water!
pages.text: The world of the Aether is not to take lightly. While it looks serene, it can be quite chilly so bring something warm with you. $(br2)And I highly recommend you not to challenge any of bosses here until you are ready... A paraglider is your best friend here!$()

pages.name: An Aether Portal
pages.text: Just pour some water on it to activate the portal. Similar to the Nether portal.

pages.title: Light it Up!
pages.text: The Nether, this hellhole... This place is no different than being inside a cooking oven. It's ridiculously too hot and everything that lives here is hostile towards you. $(br2)Make sure to bring lots of cold drinks with you!$()

pages.name: A Nether Portal
pages.text: Ignite a fire onto the obsidian block to activate!

pages.title: Unveil the Dark!
pages.text: The Beneath is not for the faint of heart. There is an evil there that does not sleep. A darkness that swallows you whole, as if it has a mind of its own. $(br2)It's neither cold or hot in there, but it's definitely something angry in there... watch yourself wanderer.$()

pages.name: A Beneath Barrier
pages.text: Break the barrier stones with a pickaxe to enter what lies underneath. Be prepared!

pages.title: Fill the Void!
pages.text: The End where the living and the dead are in constant flux. You'll see monsters here that you won't find anywhere else. $(br2)This world is mostly cold, but you might find a few spots of heat around. Though you might have wear something warm to keep yourself safe.$()

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: Where worlds go to end... as Lady $(k)Morgana$() used to say.

pages.title: Bask in Twilight!
pages.text: Throw a Mystical Tear into the pool and you'll open the portal. This world is noticeable unstable at times. Who knows how long this dimension is suppose to last. $(br2)Just becareful of this place, it's either hot or cold. Powerful dragons were seen nesting in this world.$()

pages.name: A Twilight Portal
pages.text: Use mushrooms, poppies, and/or dandelions around the 2 by 2 space of water!

pages.title: Ride the Sands!
pages.text: The world of the Atum is a beautiful golden sea of sand. With the bleaching sun above the horizon, this world was once home to an ancient civilization. $(br2)Phyneks & Lady $(k)Morgana$() could spend eons here studying. Just make sure you find a way to keep yourself cool.$()

pages.name: An Atum Portal
pages.text: it's 5 x 5 x 2 of sandstone with 3 x 3 water on the top layer.
